@description.name: @description
@description.body: Touch event object. For more information see: https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchEventClassReference/TouchEvent/TouchEvent.html

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: overridden

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of native Touch objects representing all current touches on the document. Returns an empty array for the "touchend" event.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Object[]} Array of touch objects. For more information see:
     https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html
@return.description:
Array of touch objects. For more information see:
     https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of native Touch objects representing all touches associated with the event target element. Returns an empty array for the "touchend" event.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Object[]} Array of touch objects. For more information see:
     https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html
@return.description:
Array of touch objects. For more information see:
     https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array of native Touch objects representing all touches of the target element that changed in this event. On the "touchstart" event the array contains all touches that were added to the target element. On the "touchmove" event the array contains all touches that were moved on the target element. On the "touchend" event the array contains all touches that used to be on the target element.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{Object[]} Array of touch objects. For more information see:
     https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html
@return.description:
Array of touch objects. For more information see:
     https://developer.apple.com/library/safari/#documentation/UserExperience/Reference/TouchClassReference/Touch/Touch.html

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Checks whether more than one touch is associated with the event target element.

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Returns the distance between two fingers since the start of the event. The distance is a multiplier of the initial distance. Initial value: 1.0. Gestures: < 1.0, pinch close / zoom out.

1.0, pinch open / to zoom in.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Float} The scale distance between two fingers
@return.description: The scale distance between two fingers

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the delta of the rotation since the start of the event, in degrees. Initial value is 0.0 Clockwise > 0 Counter-clockwise < 0.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an array with the calculated delta coordinates of all active touches, relative to the position on touchstart event.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Array} an array with objects for each active touch which contains the delta as x and y, the touch identifier as identifier and the movement axis as axis.
@return.description: an array with objects for each active touch which contains the delta as x and y, the touch identifier as identifier and the movement axis as axis.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the horizontal position at which the event occurred relative to the left of the document. This property takes into account any scrolling of the page.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The horizontal position of the touch in the document.
@return.description: The horizontal position of the touch in the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the vertical position at which the event occurred relative to the top of the document. This property takes into account any scrolling of the page.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The vertical position of the touch in the document.
@return.description: The vertical position of the touch in the document.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the horizontal coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the origin of the screen coordinate system.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The horizontal position of the touch
@return.description: The horizontal position of the touch

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the vertical coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the origin of the screen coordinate system.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The vertical position of the touch
@return.description: The vertical position of the touch

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the the horizontal coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the viewport.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The horizontal position of the touch
@return.description: The horizontal position of the touch

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get the vertical coordinate at which the event occurred relative to the viewport.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} The vertical position of the touch
@return.description: The vertical position of the touch

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the unique identifier for a certain touch object.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object
@param.description: The index of the Touch object

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer} Unique identifier of the touch object
@return.description: Unique identifier of the touch object

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns an event specific touch on the target element. This function is used as the "touchend" event only offers Touch objects in the changedTouches array.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
touchIndex {Integer ? 0} The index of the Touch object to
     retrieve
@param.description:
The index of the Touch object to
     retrieve

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the event specific touches on the target element. This function is used as the "touchend" event only offers Touch objects in the changedTouches array.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Indicates if the event occurs during the "touchend" phase. Needed to determine the event specific touches. Override this method if you derive from this class and want to indicate that the specific event occurred during the "touchend" phase.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the event occurred during the "touchend" phase
@return.description: Whether the event occurred during the "touchend" phase

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxObjectId. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxObjectId}.
